headline: Brady Corporation elects Board of Directors and declares regular dividend to shareholders
summary: MILWAUKEE, Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brady Corporation (NYSE: BRC) (“Company”) announced that shareholders of the Company’s Class B Common Voting Stock have voted unanimously in favor of the election of the director nominees to a one-year term at the Company’s annual meeting of shareholders held today in Milwaukee. Elected to the Brady Corporation Board of Directors are: Patrick W. Allender, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer (Retired), Danaher CorporationDr. David S. B

content.title: Brady Corporation elects Board of Directors and declares regular dividend to shareholders
content.summary: MILWAUKEE, Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brady Corporation (NYSE: BRC) (“Company”) announced that shareholders of the Company’s Class B Common Voting Stock have voted unanimously in favor of the election of the director nominees to a one-year term at the Company’s annual meeting of shareholders held today in Milwaukee. Elected to the Brady Corporation Board of Directors are: Patrick W. Allender, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer (Retired), Danaher CorporationDr. David S. B
